sourcesContent:
import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form';

export default function AddContact(props){

    state = {
        firstName:' ',
        surname: ' ',
        email: ' ',
        phone: ' '
    } 

    onChange = event => { this.setState({[event.target.name]: event.target.value}) };

return (
    <Form>
        <Form.Row>
            <Form.Group as={this.Col}>
            <Form.Label>FirstName</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control
            type="text"
            name="firstName"
            value={this.firstName}
            onChange={this.onChange}
            /></Form.Group>
        </Form.Row>
        <Form.Row>
            <Form.Group as={this.Col}>
            <Form.Label>Surname</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control
            type="text"
            name="surname"
            value={this.surname}
            onChange={this.onChange}
            /></Form.Group>
        </Form.Row>
        <Form.Row>
            <Form.Group as={this.Col}>
            <Form.Label>Email</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control
            type="text"
            name="email"
            pattern="^[\w-\+]+(\.[\w]+)@[\w-]+(\.[\w]+)(\.[a-z]{2,})$"
            value={this.email}
            onChange={this.onChange}
            /></Form.Group>
        </Form.Row>
        <Form.Row>
            <Form.Group as={this.Col}>
            <Form.Label>Phone</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control
            type="text"
            name="phone"
            pattern="[0-9]{3}[0-9]{3}[0-9]{4}"
            value={this.phone}
            onChange={this.onChange}
            /></Form.Group>
        </Form.Row>
    </Form>       
) }
